channel.title: cycode on Daniel Berstein
channel.description: Recent content in cycode on Daniel Berstein

item.title: Blog :: Cycode and future
item.author: Daniel Berstein (daniel@basegeo.com)
item.description:
Guess what? Cycode is now past tense to me. I will keep forever fond memories of the company and all Cycoders.

The future is not ours to tell. Only the present. Mine reads “spread your wings again, much fresh air to gain”.

Love & success.

item.title: Blog :: Cycode
item.author: Daniel Berstein (daniel@basegeo.com)
item.description: I am happy to announce I’m joining an amazing team at Cycode as Devops Engineer.
